entry.title: Video Batch Frame Blending Editing Effects Automation Assistant
entry.content:
• Video Processing: Can set video source directory, shooting video directory, output directory; supports batch processing, can set frame interpolation floating, interval frame count, skip start frame count and other parameters.

  • Text Configuration: Can enable adding text at top, middle, bottom positions of video, set font size, color, position, bold, stroke thickness and color, and also select font files.

  • Size Enlargement: Image not clearly shown, but presumed to have related functionality.

  • Video to Image: Select video directory and image output directory, can save by video, store separated images to corresponding video name folders, or output all to specified directory.

  • System Configuration: Can choose hardware acceleration mode as CPU, can enable decoding, encoding hardware acceleration and save configuration.

  • Account and Video Management: Select account folder, can delete original video; supports scheduled publishing, set cover image mode.

  • Upload Settings: Set upload timeout, account single upload video count, account cycle count.

  • Task Execution: Can view task execution status, including current folder information, video count for each account, etc., can stop task execution.

entry.title: QR Code Ordering Smart Store - User End
entry.content:
• QR code ordering smart store offline QR code ordering system
  • Gold bean red envelope marketing system, gold bean cash deduction, users get gold beans from online/offline shopping, sharing invitations get gold beans, task check-in gets gold beans, inter-user gold bean gifting
  • Stored value card function, coupon function, review system, nearby merchants, etc.
  • Exchange system: supports third-party points system integration, original third-party user points can be exchanged for QR code ordering smart store points

entry.title: 🧑‍💻About
entry.content:
Hi, welcome to Harry Work💻

Harry Work is a small studio specializing in developing mini-games/mini-programs/H5/public accounts/Apps. We are not only “prolific” but also “refined.” We can talk about “sentiments” and show off our cases.

Most of our clients are small and medium-sized startups. We tailor-make Apps/public accounts/mini-programs, etc., according to the actual business of our clients. We continuously update and maintain applications with the business growth of our clients, and we have accumulated a group of long-term loyal customers.

👉We have no fancy publicity and packaging, only believe that quality and word of mouth are the best publicity

Whatever application you need, we can provide customized solutions

📱

  • comfyui automation, open-source AI deployment application
  • Helping small and medium-sized companies build internal automation systems
  • Office automation (Python + Excel + process RPA), etc.
  • Technology selection consultant (such as whether to use a low-code platform, whether to use a certain database)
  • Android/IOS App design and development
  • WeChat/Alipay/TikTok mini-program design and development
  • Public account/H5 design and development
  • Python script/assistant development, browser plug-in development/grease monkey development
  • Around the above related businesses, including but not limited to: domain name registration, server purchase, ICP filing, server deployment/optimization, HTTPS deployment, enterprise email, etc.

🎮

  • Godot/Cocos/Unity

Thank you for your attention and support

  • What is a requirements document?
  • Project collaboration guidelines

entry.title: 🤝Project Collaboration Guidelines - 💡Before Contacting Us
entry.content:
To save time and effort for both parties, and to quickly clarify your requirements for providing reasonable quotes and timeframes, we hope you can prepare a requirements document outlining your application needs before contacting us.

The process of writing a requirements document will help you review your project, clarify your project expectations, and make it easier to “compare options” with a clear requirements document, reducing misunderstandings that might arise from ambiguous requirements during communication.

If you don’t know how to write a requirements document, here are some examples (not mandatory, for reference only):

  • Project background and objectives: Introduce the origin of the project, the problems to be solved, and the overall goals

  • Functional requirements: List the features the system needs to implement, including user interface/role permissions/processing logic, etc.

  • Non-functional requirements: List the system’s performance metrics/security requirements/availability/reliability/usability and other non-functional requirements

  • UI design requirements: Describe the design style/layout/icons and colors of the system’s user interface

  • Testing plan and acceptance criteria: Define the system testing plan and acceptance criteria to ensure effective testing after development

  • Implementation constraints and limitations: List any technical limitations such as languages/frameworks and operating systems

  • Time planning and milestones: Clarify the project timeline and milestones to ensure timely completion and expected results

Collaboration Process

  1. Based on your requirements document and further communication to clarify needs, we will provide a quote
  2. Sign a contract
  3. Pay the deposit
  4. Design/development
  5. Testing and acceptance
  6. Pay the balance
  7. Launch and operation
  8. Provide 1-6 months of free maintenance based on project scale (no new requirements changes)
  9. Long-term technical support available on an hourly basis, including requirement updates/application upgrades and maintenance
